name: TrafFox
description:
Nellie Engström
Unfortunately Unity crashed during the development of this game resulting in that the whole project was erased and couldn't be restored, a few days before submission. This is an old version of the game, it has many flaws and there is a lot of things that would have been improved before considering it done. But it's better than nothing!

In the Tutorial, there are suppose to be text which pops up when different tasks are completed, these disappeared when building the game for WebGL. The messages sent are the following:
1. "Press A to move to the left"
2. "Press D to move to the right"
3. "Good job!"
4. "Avoid cars and jump over logs with Space"
Then when the player collides with a car the message "Avoid hitting the cars" are shown, and when colliding with the logs "Jump over the logs with Space". 

Also when the Tutorial ends, you can't (in this build) exit the Tutorial-scene which was fixed in a later version. There are also more problems like the "HighScore"-scene in this build being the same as the HighScore-scene shown at the end of a game-run (also fixed in a later version) and the HighScore itself not working properly, which I
tried to make up for in a new very simpel game just to show that I can create a Highscore-system that works and have sounds connected to the gameplay, here is the link to that game: https://ennell.itch.io/komplettering

My intention was of course to fix these problems but couldn't because I no longer have access the project files.
